Articles.Content: I wouldn't mind solid color windows, but I would really prefer something other than blue.. The blue windows are very meh in my opinion, I'd rather a grey of some kind.. Not a deal-breaker, I'm veeeery eager to download this
Im try build Mun outpost.
I like the way you made the ramp optional...awesome as always,bobcat
Frickin' cool beans. I'm gonna have to use a crowbar to get away from the PC when this comes out
Bobcat, you are a genius. I love it!!
Im not genius, just i have a lot expirience(after HOME pack) make landers, rovers, base.... and now im ready make constellation program.

So.... Release soon?

Awesome work Bobcat! Every time you make a mod I need to find a new drool-bucket!

This looks more polished then most of my mods.
That's fantastic work, BobCat. I'm going to be using that cargo lander a lot.
oh...so youre working up?does that mean vostok is gonna be the most awesome thing ever created?
Amazing work once again, BobCat!
vostok need ingame open cockpits. Now only srf plugin have it, but this work no good.

vostok need ingame open cockpits. Now only srf plugin have it, but this work no good.

Would it ever be cool to see someone make a Cupola with that transparent window plugin. Would be neat to see a Kerbal floating around in my space station. haha
Bobcat you had it working a few days ago, why not make another copy and retrace your steps and try to find out what you did/didn't do that is causing it to glitch?

Im try build Mun outpost.

Heh, if i was flying that mission, i would probably crash 10 times all over. Especially if i saw that rock at the last minute, like on your first landing, i would jump around and try to avoid it and boom

Anyway, all parts look amazing!
Hey bobcat, did you get my PM's?

im have a lot message every day. Im answered now

Im also not hold work on Soviet pack.

In next update you see

Change;

Changed texture format - now game load faster

Toggle ASAS cfg fix and other small bugfix

Add

New experemental Buran landing gear.

Edited June 12, 2013 by BobCat
Like the gear bobcat! Can't wait for both updates!

im have a lot message every day. Im answered now

Im also not hold work on Soviet pack.

In next update you see

Change;

Changed texture format - now game load faster

Toggle ASAS cfg fix and other small bugfix

Add

New experemental Buran landing gear.

Now their like the rover wheels?

Edited June 12, 2013 by DarthVader

I don't know if anyone else had the issue with the Buran, where the left section of the wing was missing completely from the pack?

Maybe it was just me, but it's been for the past two releases of the Soviet pack. Help anyone?

Kyle

cfg change maybe.

DarthVader

I hope so, now they barely move on terrain with full throttle for me, it's like "no taxi for you"

Kyle

cfg change maybe.

"

I tried that, but couldn't find the model at all for the left wing section. It seems to be non-existent in my directory. Sigh.. The Kliper is fun, but I need to start bringing up some serious payloads.

I don't know if anyone else had the issue with the Buran, where the left section of the wing was missing completely from the pack?

Maybe it was just me, but it's been for the past two releases of the Soviet pack. Help anyone?

I just downloaded the pack (fresh) 1.8.5 and opened it .. here is the part you are looking for:

\Soviet Pack ver1.8.4\GameData\BobCatind\SovietPack\Parts\Buran_LWsection

(yeah it says 1.8.4, but Bobcat didn't rename the folder when he updated it, ... it really is 1.8.5)

The Orion's parachutes work really well, I was doing a reentry test starting from 5,000k and burnin retrograde (using an ares 1 upper stage) till I was falling straight down, I then proceeded to fall for like 10 minutes (using time warp of course). I decoupled the service module at 80,000 m and oriented my self for reentry(straight down). I hit the atmosphere at 3 km/s and immidietly started flaming but slowed down rapidly and as soon as the chutes deployed i was fine. I'll try from 10,000k tommorow.
Not gonna be as good in the next update I think, because bobcat is doing the double chute system.

Bobcat a couple of your videos ago showing off the LER, you had 2 of the ISS modules landed as a Mun base ... HOW ... O.o My Mind It Has Been BLOWN ...

*Gollum Voice* I Needs The Landing Procedures ... Yes My Precious We Must Have Them .. GOLLUMGOLLUM ... The Nice Bobcatsus Will Give Them To Us He Will YESSS...
